Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Cicero
ShortDescription: EB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Cicero, 16th, Kostner, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Cicero, 16th, Kostner, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Cicero.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/15th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, 18th, Wood, 14th, and Damen due to, near Damen/15th.
